name: UDJ01CameraMode
doc:
UDJ01CameraMode

     Base class for all camera modes.

CameraTypeTag:
A tag that can be queried by gameplay code that cares when a kind of camera mode is active
without having to ask about a specific mode (e.g., when aiming downsights to get more accuracy)
FieldOfView: The horizontal field of view (in degrees).
BlendTime: How long it takes to blend in this mode.
BlendExponent: Exponent used by blend functions to control the shape of the curve.
